entry.title: Department of Housing and Urban Development - Chief Technology Officer (SES)
entry.content:
HUD is looking for a Chief Technology Officer to oversee their technology execution. This includes policy oversight, including their Enterprise Architecture division.

Closes 2022-12-30.

Apply here!

entry.title: NYC Office of Technology and Innovation - Assistant Commissioner, Digital Services
entry.content:
The New York City Office of Technology and Innovation is looking for a director for their Digital Services team!

Check it out!

entry.title: Office of the Comptroller of the Currency - Chief Information Officer (NB 8)
entry.content:
OCC (part of the Department of the Treasury) is looking to hire for their CIO slot! As an executive role at a financial agency, the salary for this position is $160-288K!

Closes 2022-12-01.

Apply here!

entry.title: Census Bureau - Emerging Technology Fellowship (GS 15)
entry.content:
The Census Bureau’s Emerging Technology Fellowship is now accepting applicants! They’re looking for folks with broad experience in programming, data, AI, and other disciplines to improve data-driven government services through the xD program!

Closes 2022-12-15.

Apply here!

entry.title: Library of Congress - Digital Projects Coordinator (GS 14)
entry.content:
The LOC is a great place to work, and right now they’re looking for a coordinator for digital projects in Discovery and Preservation Services.

Closes 2022-12-09.

Apply here!

entry.title: Farm Production and Conservation - Assistant Chief Information Officer (SES)
entry.content:
FPAC (part of USDA) serves employees and customers across the Farm Service Agency (FSA), the Natural Resource Conservation Service (NRCS) and the Risk Management Agency (RMA). THe ACIO is responsible for planning, directing, and coordinating the Mission Area’s information technology program.

Closes 2022-12-08.

Apply here!

entry.title: Department of Transportation - Deputy Chief Data Officer (GS 15)
entry.content:
The US Department of Transportation is hiring a Deputy Chief Data Officer. This is an amazing role for managing their enterprise data efforts and improving customer experience!

Closes 2022-12-05.

Apply here!

entry.title: California State - Deputy Director of Service Innovation
entry.content:
The California Office of Data and Innovation (ODI) is looking for a Deputy Director of Service Innovation. This is a fantastic role with real impact to the people of California.

Check it out!

entry.title: Partnership for Public Service - Senior Manager for CX
entry.content:
The Partnership for Public Service, a 501(c)(3) nonprofit, is looking for a Senior Manager to oversee research & programming for their customer experience projects.

Check it out!

entry.title: Mass Bay Transportation Authority - Various Roles
entry.content:
MBTA in Boston is hiring for a variety of roles - product designers, engineers, project managers, QA, etc.

Check it out!

entry.title: General Services Administration 18F - Various Roles (GS 14-15)
entry.content:
18F is one of the absolute best technology teams, providing services to the rest of the government. They’re currently hiring for UX Designers, Service Designers, Content Strategists, and Product Designers! They’re also looking for bilingual folks to do content design in Spanish!

Check it out!

entry.title: Internet Society - Various Roles
entry.content:
The Internet Society works on open, global internet issues - they’re hiring for a variety of roles from technology to fundraising to project management.

Check it out!

entry.title: Boston MAPC - Web Developer
entry.content:
The Boston Metropolitan Area Planning Council is hiring a Web Developer (React/Ember/Ruby/Node) to work on trail maps and things!

Check it out!

entry.title: San Francisco Digital Services - Various Roles
entry.content:
The SF Digital Services team has a bunch of open roles including QA, project management, and analytics.

Check it out!

entry.title: NYC Benefits Access - Senior Product Manager
entry.content:
Senior Product Manager for the Benefits Access portfolio in the NYC Mayor’s Office.

Check it out!
